name: Sidney the Super Space Snake
description:
Help Sidney the Super Space Snake escape the from the Evil Quellor's floating electro-prison. 

The original Sidney the Super Space Snake was released 1991 for the Tandy Color Computer 3. This retro remake for Windows and Linux  brings the same simple, yet challenging fun with  all the retro charm.   99% skill, 1% luck!

"The scenario is that Sidney, the nearsighted snake, was caught having an affair with a rope and has been imprisoned by Quellor in a floating electro-prison. Quellor is the landlord of a mass of land a mile long and two feet wide (the major products of this land are rope and noodles). Realizing that Sidney does not have a leg to stand on, you have become the champion of fairness and have vowed to help Sidney escape. " 
-- Review from The Rainbow Magazine Vol 11, No 4 (November 1991)  p37
